alert.note: Alert for Chaves; Curry; De Baca; Guadalupe; Quay; Roosevelt (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued February 26 at 2:31PM MST until February 26 at 4:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Roosevelt County in east central New Mexico... Eastern De Baca County in east central New Mexico... Northeastern Chaves County in southeastern New Mexico... Southern Quay County in east central New Mexico... Curry County in east central New Mexico... East central Guadalupe County in east central New Mexico... * Until 400 PM MST. * At 228 PM MST, a large area of dust was spreading east and northeast across east central and southeast New Mexico. HAZARD...Less than two miles visibility with strong wind in excess of 60 mph. SOURCE...Satellite imagery. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes the following highways... Highway 60 between Mile Markers 317 and 397. Highway 380 between Mile Markers 161 and 199. Locations impacted include... Clovis, Portales, Fort Sumner, Quay, Farwell, Dexter, Hagerman, Texico, Melrose and Elida. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!

area.areaDesc: Chaves; Curry; De Baca; Guadalupe; Quay; Roosevelt
